subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Variant of {{l|mul|臼}}.

The reformative usage in simplified Chinese and Japanese that replaced {{l|mul|舊}} can be analysed either as from an elimination of {{l|mul|雈}} with glyphic alteration from {{l|mul|臼}} to {{l|mul|旧}} or as using a homophonic character.

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|旧%式|きゅう%しき}}: old type
* {{ja-r|旧%制|きゅう%せい}}: old system
* {{ja-r|旧%姓|きゅう%せい}}: former surname
* {{ja-r|旧%態|きゅう%たい}}: old state of affairs
* {{ja-r|旧%派|きゅう%は}}: the old school
* {{ja-r|旧%約|きゅう%やく}}: [[Old Testament]]
* {{ja-r|旧%来|きゅう%らい}}: traditional
* {{ja-r|旧%里|きゅう%り}}: [[hometown]]
* {{ja-r|旧%暦|きゅう%れき}}: Japan's old lunisolar calendar;
* {{ja-r|旧%居|きゅう%きょ}}: former residence
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|旧%株|きゅう%かぶ}}: old stock
* {{ja-r|旧%弊|きゅう%へい}}: old evil
* {{ja-r|旧%軍%人|きゅう%ぐん%じん}}: ex-soldier
* {{ja-r|旧%正%月|きゅう%しょう%がつ}}: lunisolar New Year
* {{ja-r|旧%世%界|きゅう%せ%かい}}: the old world
* {{ja-r|旧%保%守|きゅう%ほ%しゅ}}: [[paleoconservative]]
* {{ja-r|懐%旧|かい%きゅう}}: nostalgia
* {{ja-r|復%旧|ふっ%きゅう}}: recover
* {{ja-r|旧に復する|きゅう に ふくする}}: be restored to a former state
{{der-bottom}}
